name: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Dual Destinies - Turnabout Reclaimed
summary: Special Episode: Turnabout Reclaimed is an extra downloadable episode of Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney: Dual Destinies, set between The Monstrous Turnabout and Turnabout Academy. It follows Phoenix Wright's first case after regaining his attorney's badge, with the most unusual of clients, an orca named Orla accused of killing her owner, Jack Shipley.
